But then, it just goes on and on and gets more ridiculous, that eventually, I was like, "OK, that's  weird and I guess funny because of its weirdness." Perfectly good zany comedy otherwise. It won't bother me if there's never a sequel. But if there is, I'd probably watch it.

reviews.review_title: I must have been watching a different movie
reviews.content: Lots of hilarious moments - exactly what you'd hope for from a Will Ferrell take on Sherlock.

I knew It was going to be a parody, so I had zero expectations, but that experience was a disaster. I felt I was brain damaged when I left the cinema. The movie should really be banned for broadcasting as it is dangerous for the mental health of the people. I am serious. Shame for the actors participating in that piece of garbage that do not deserve to be called a movie. I am ashamed that I had tortured myself so much and I did not leave the cinema hall after the very first minute of that all time nonsense. And yes, zero is not enough low grade for that. Please, all of you who still haven't watched it, do not do it even if they pay you for that.

I can't believe how bad it was. I don't wish anyone to see this and waste time out of their life. Best part was the credits. I usually love his movies and I don't know how I lasted through that one. Don't see it trust me.

reviews.review_title: Funny parts but overall not funny.
reviews.content: Although the movie had a few funny scenes that made me chuckle. Many scenes where cringe worthy laugh grabs that didn't deserve to see the light of day.
Turned it off half way through. It is a lot of corny jokes that arent funny and a lack of some kind of story that grabs you.
Please tell me post production ruined this? It felt like a bout of constipation being remedied by just pushing harder.

If you like slapstick comedies and enjoyed Step Brothers then you'll really enjoy this movie too. Well acted, funny, and just enough plot development to keep you entertained and attentive for the short run time.
It's entertainment. It was (intentionally) silly, stupid and slapstick. Don't expect to be moved or to walk away with some new epiphany about humanity.

I gave it a five because the trailer teaser was funny. I haven't seen it yet. Nor will I see it yet. Why? You ask.
Because you can't smoke pot and drink cheap alcohol at the movies! Judging by the 3.4 stars and plenty of 1 star reviews...I'm going to heavily need it!

I don't actually know why didn't people like this movie. It is really funny and good. It doesn't deserve 1 star, at least 5 star or more. I think people don't like it because movie make fun of england and uk queen.

reviews.review_title: Mystery Science Theater has played better movies....
reviews.content: You know that feeling you get when you're eating an onion like an apple? I mean, like really going to town on it? Like the juice is just running down your beard? No? Me either. But I am certain it feels just like watching this movie. I had a Redbox promo code so this thing only cost .50 but I'm honestly considering taking Gary Sanchez Productions to small claims court. Because even at that price, I feel defrauded and emotionally injured. A movie was promised, and used horse manure was delivered....

Have no idea what's up with the bad reviews. This is not a bad film, unless you cannot stand British accents. You will enjoy the numerous contemporary references. There are quite a few sexual innuendos that is better left out, and the opening is not very strong, and there is comedic violence, but there are many, many moments when it allowed me to laugh at the silliness of Holmes and Watson. There is even a delightful musical interlude. And half the places you look, there is good humour. I enjoyed Elf, so I don't mind its silliness.
This film made me laugh quite a lot. I know humour is different for everyone, but I don't regret watching it at all.However, keep in mind that this film is a parody on Holmes and the characters are very, very different from that in the original story. However, in the end, i was able to accept the characters as they are.But definitely NOT a family film. And you must learn to be comfortable with ignoring offending portions to appreciate it.Sad that there is too much crude humour.

The movie was not one that I would typically watch. But I like both actors and decided to borrow it from my local library to see if my DVD player can play Blue Ray discs (it can). Most jokes failed to score with me but several did cause a laugh. Not a bad film if the viewer likes Ferrell and Reilly. Just not a favorite for me.

reviews.review_title: Make me laugh, but is still horrible
reviews.content: Holmes and Watson is a crude movie with bad performances and with horrible jokes but I still kinda laughed
One of the most disappointing movies of all time! Stupid and forced humor. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY!

reviews.review_title: Not worth your time or money
reviews.content: This wasn't quite the comedy i would have expected. A few laughable sceens.
I love these guys working together, I was so excited for this movie. I could not even finish the movie it was so bad, save yourself the hassle.

A wonderfully funny parody of the classic duo. Holmes and Watson is utterly ridiculous in the best way. No one is safe from caricature! From Holmes' unrestrained lack of sensibility to Watson's overzealous loyalty. Even modern issues are given a snide gibe in a light and well done manner.I found this film entirely satisfying and humorous, and recommend it for those who are familiar with and enjoy satire.

I rarely like this kind of American farting film, but this one was very good for its genre. Normally I would turn something like this off after ten minutes. This movie I watched to the end. Very funny, although, more sophisticated humour would have been more gratifying.

I waited for this film for a long time, and I told my wife who never like movies that she had to watch this movie with me in the cinema, and throughout the month I was telling her that it would be a greet movie because the actors were one of the best comedians in the world.thanks to this movie ....... my wife will never listen to me again

reviews.review_title: I would like my money back please.
reviews.content: This film was terrible--maybe it would entertain 11 year olds but I found it to be a huge disappointment. Considering it was a Will Farrell movie--I expected more.
The movie is so boring and painful to watch i've lost all that love i had of sherlock holmes movies because of this film im not saticfied at all.

reviews.review_title: I couldnt believe how bad this was.
reviews.content: After i saw the trailer for this i thought it would be bad but nothing prepares you for what you'll see! Its a shame that after all those past hits that it should come to this! I would explain more but ive wasted to much time watching that utter rubbish. Just take my word for it!

52 year old man having followed both Ferrell's and Reilly's careers since they started out. I marveled at Talladega Nights and Stepbrothers, just to mention some recents... but this. THIS! Is complete waste of talent and time. My time and yours.Evolve or die.

I went into the cinema with high expectations, left feeling extremely disappointed. Terrible writing as a story, but the laughs aren't as bad as critics say they are in my opinion. But don't watch this, God.

reviews.review_title: Expected to hate this with a vengeance. Didn't.
reviews.content: The two leads are the weak points in this film. Fiennes and the supporting cast provide the vast majority of the laughs, along with the completely anachronistic music. It's well-shot and the sets are lovely (the banners on stalls at the fair are hilarious). Not terrible. Have wine first.

reviews.review_title: Takes a bit of background info to enjoy
reviews.content: Watch the 2009 Robert Downey Jr. Sherlock Holmes before you watch this and make sure you know a bit about historic Britain. Once you do that the jokes will make more sense. I can see why a good amount of people didnt like it. Im already a Will Ferrel and John C. Reilly fan, which helped me give it a 7 and watch it twice before i brought it back to the red box.

reviews.review_title: Predictable and not funny, just awful.
reviews.content: A truly awful film. The film we wanted was sold out but decided a Will Ferrell film is normally good for a laugh. How wrong we were. All their usual attempts at humour but none really landed and it seemed a bit confused about what way it wanted to be funny. Great supporting cast but wasted on a really poor movie.Only reason I didn't leave during was because my husband fell asleep and it seemed a shame to wake him.
Keep the politics and the senseless mind numbing rhetoric out. Worst comedy in decades.

This is not a good movie. Period.
I can imagine that you nevertheless enjoyed it (I too have my guilty pleasures) but rewarding this redundant piece of Hollywood comedy with the highest possible score doesn't make sense at all.
Let's be honest here. There are movies out there that deserve a 10 and this one definitely isn't one of them. Not by a long shot.

reviews.review_title: Great for nonsense and a laugh
reviews.content: There's a lot of 'serious' reviews here as though a comedy has to make sense every time, or has to stick to rules of other comedies.This doesnt. It is a slapstick. It is funny and isnt a film that really follows a plot or asks you to pay attention to keep up. Its just fun. Nothing complex and nothing thought provoking.It isnt quite as enjoyable as Step Brothers but both pair up well as headline actors and has some corkers in it. Worth a watch for a light hearted and laugh and something to switch your mind off with. Not many films let you do that these days.

reviews.review_title: First movie I've ever walked out of.
reviews.content: This movie was a complete waste of time and money. That was 45 minutes of my life I'll never get back. It was beyond stupid on all levels. We were literally the only people in the theatre when we decided to leave, about 45 minutes into the movie. To bother saying anything more would be giving this movie more credit than it's worth.
I may have lied just a little.............................

I haven't laughed so hard in a long time these guys are brilliant together. There are so many funny little parts in it...
How anyone can rate this film less than a 7 Is beyond me! Who knows maybe they've lost their sense of humour or a comedy just isn't for them 🤔
This movie was a waste of time and I regret sitting through it. It wasn't funny at all.
Love this duo but this film was painful to watch. We turned it off halfway through and didn't finish it.

reviews.review_title: Couldn't get past the first 20 minutes
reviews.content: I tried watching this with the girlfriend. We both like Will Farrell & John Reilly and we know their films can be a bit hit & miss but we've never found one of their films unwatchable before.I feel a bit mean leaving a review, but as I believe I can count on one hand the amount of films I've not been able to finish (this being among them) it seemed fair to warn people off.Really not sure what they were thinking with this but we were 17 mins in before we decided we really couldn't be bothered with any more.

reviews.review_title: Eh, Feels like most of them were expecting to much
reviews.content: Yeah, Sure I have seen better comedy movies. But for going into this movie with innocent eyes I actually thought it was enjoyable. The humour is cheap and all but you will find this more entertaining than your average romantic comedy or family comedy.I enjoyed and thought it was a movie that you could watch on your spare time alone. Laughed and got a couple of giggles. Better than monty python, romantic comedies and so forth. Maybe a bit low for a ferrel movie, nothing I would pay for in cinema, but It's a netflix laidback comedy to watch alone if you are down or anything.

Hollywood's best film tragedy! Terrible plot, poorly casted with Will Ferrell as lead, and lame humor with political undertones. I thought the movie would never end. The best part of this movie were the credits at the end.
Terrible, really really terrible. Not sure what to say the worst movies I've ever seen I laughed but I was embarrassed for Will Ferrell

Funny Laugh out loud often immature, often clever, why don't people just put the bias away and enjoy a movie for what it is?
Just like food or clothes or music, people enjoy a huge variety and everyone has their own flavours, me I thoroughly enjoyed the OTT acting, comedic timing and subtle modern references, well done all those that starred in this including the kids. Go enjoy and if you don't then you might also not like mangoes but I do, you might hate squid but so do I......
This is the first movie that made me walk out of the theatre. It's that bad. I did my best to wait for something better, but the vomiting scene was more than i could handle...

reviews.review_title: Funny! Laugh your ass off movie
reviews.content: Forget the reviews who think this movie is crap. Holmes amd Watson is full of laughs and hilarious jokes. Ferrell and Reilly do not disapoint and are comical geniuses, who once again compliment each other perfectly. I'm not sure who was funnier! I only write reviews for movies that super impress me and this did. If you enjoyed Step Brothers or Talladega Nights, give this movie a go. Its funny!

reviews.review_title: Comedy is in the eye of the beholder
reviews.content: What is funny to one person isn't always funny to another. We're all individuals and have different tastes. In my case, I found the dialog to be just an endless stream of not-so-funny stuff.I don't usually read IMDb reviews prior to watching a movie. In this case, about 20 minutes in I checked and wasn't surprised by the current overall rating of 3.8.Ferrell and Reilly have a niche audience who will always like their style of humor, and there are also those who won't. There's no real right or wrong.

reviews.review_title: Worst movie I've seen in a long time
reviews.content:
If you are looking for something to do, do not consider this to be entertaining. The few forced laughs I had while watching were mostly becasue of how hard they were trying to make it funny or because of my sister's reaction to the scene.
And dispite the great casting, the portrayal of every character brings shame to everything that is Sherlock Holmes.
Just a complete waste of time and money. Arguably the worst movie I have ever watched. I made it 40 minutes in before I ended my suffering and turned it off.
I normally always finish a movie even if I'm not enjoying it. Just out of curiosity. I could care less on this one.
Absolute rubbish of a movie!!! Massive hype due to their previous work but clearly that did not come across to this movie. A true waste of film!

reviews.review_title: I want a refund! Terrible movie!
reviews.content: This movie was terrible from start to finish. The slams on President Trump and the anti-American quips were ridiculous. The best thing about this movie was I got to eat popcorn and take a nap. We should be able to sue for pain and suffering.
Terrible comedy, I asked for my money back. Of course they didn't refund my money but I had to try. I can honestly say I will never see another movie with these 2 guys in in, alone or otherwise.

reviews.review_title: It is good movie, when you whant it too be good
reviews.content: I can't believe this movie has only 3.8... This move is a obvious parody od Robert D Jr Sherlock, and mister Farrel and John did marvelous job... This move is just that - brane off, and you just laugh on every over ekspreded moment...
This movie caused no emotional reaction from me at any point. No laughter or even disgust. It's not even cringy in any way. Simply one of the most boring films I've ever seen.

reviews.review_title: Not sure where the 1 star reviews are coming from
reviews.content: This is a comedy like the other guys. They just don't filter the good jokes from bad. I found it hilarious though.

reviews.review_title: In a world without John C Reilly, where would Will Ferell be?
reviews.content: Will Ferrell has proven he can act(stranger than fiction) once. Other than that he has done nothing. he's coached by on his SNL skits which the funniest ones consisted of ones where he broke character and couldn't even maintain the scene. It's sad when Adam Sandler has more good rolls under his belt. If it wasn't for John C. Reilly Will Ferrell would be nothing.

reviews.review_title: Just a regular comedy, not that bad at all, please igonre the hate reviews
reviews.content: The movie is definitely not Stepbrothers, but it has some good jokes. It's an alright 6-6.5 movie easy. Everything that Will Ferrell does has something good in it. It's better that the casino movie, but worst than his old classics.
Really bummed me out. I feel let down by Will Ferrel. Lost a fan.

I watch movies to relax and escape modern day problems through comedy. This movie is mostly political, liberal, soap box to take jabs at the U.S., guns, women and Trump. By doing this you have insulted half your fan base. If I wanted to see and hear garbage I could have rented it Michael Moore film. Save your money on this poor excuse of a movie.
Shockingly, an appaling movie with two of my favourite comedians.
Got like 2 decent laughs out of the movie things got reptative and old quick , also took a date to this movie .. we walked out half way

After reading the reviews i expected this film to be horrendous but i found myself smiling and chuckling the whole way through. I'm not a huge fan of the 2 leads but you can't deny their chemistry with hilarious results. I rented this movie but wouldn't have been disappointed had i purchased it. I will definitely add to the collection. Would have loved to seen a gag reel on the dvd.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as I was hoping
reviews.content:
I loved Talladega Night. Loved StepBrothers. Thought this would have been a great movie like those...but sadly it's not. The comedy is mild and slightly funny at best. The political spats were ignorant and not funny at all. I'm guessing they couldn't come up with a good or funny lines. Hopefully they come out with there good stuff in a part 2 as long as it's not this movie.
Very sad this movie was a flop.

Its funny weird stupid but it doesn't deserve the hate its getting you should watch it for sure.The movie has its funny bit its trying to be anything thats what its a all about its just stupid and funny.

They must have had a right laugh making this. I like all this stupid humour it's silly but fun. Kind of reminds me of bottom for any one who watched it. Not sure about all the hate. Maybe these people just don't get it. The godfather it isn't but it's a giggle for sure. If you like will and John c you will like this.

Like most of Ferrells films, this one also includes a lot of sillyness.
Watching it alone it still made me laugh out loud several times. A rare thing and cant remember when that happened last.

Doesn't matter its screenplay or characters.
This made me laugh and that's enough to
Give this rate.I love Will Ferrell and his partner.

reviews.review_title: It's exactly what you think it will be.... not great.
reviews.content: It contains the same tidbits of Tallagadega Nights, Step Brothers, etc, ect. just in a bad British accent. It feels like a lot of it was improvised and off script, maybe that's good, maybe not. 3 of the 4 people I was with liked it, I was bored and almost dozed off a few times.There are funny parts, albeit they are far and few between, but the uncrowded theater did not laugh loudly at very much, there was an occasional chuckle, I chuckled a few times, too. To me it might be worth the price of a DVD rental from Redbox, but I didn't feel like I got my money's worth from this one.
I laughed just once during this movie. This movie is a mess from the begining to the end and I regret my decision to spend money for the ticket.
I fall asleep watching this movie, it is just mostly unfunny
Found the movie quite enjoyable. Reminder me of comedies from when I was young. It gave me the same feeling as Coming to America, Trains planes and automobiles, etc used to.
I see a lot of people here don't have a sense of humor. I really enjoyed this movie and a lot of scenes in it

reviews.review_title: I didn't even smile it was so bad.
reviews.content: Not one smile, chuckle or grin. It was truly the worst movie maybe ever created. So bad you can't even make fun of it.

I was wondering to watch Second Act or Holmes and Watson.I watching Holmes and Watson because this is the first comedy that I was watching in the Bulgarian cinema.I recommend this movie to people who have a desire comedy movies.

Very disappointing. In a comedy, you can get over bad English accents but nothing really came together. The plot was half baked and the "jokes" fell flat. I'm not a big critic. I can usually find something to enjoy in most movies and if I leave moderately entertained, the movie has served it's purpose. But every now and then there's a movie I just can find nothing entertaining in. This was one of them. Pretty lousy movie and that's sad to me because Ferrell and Reilly make such a a good comic duo usually. Had high hopes for the film.

After struggling to make it through 45 minutes of this film, I started to wonder what on earth possessed actors of the standing of Ferrel and Reilly to do this film. All the cast can be put in this statement as well.I fear after watching part of this film I may have forgotten how to laugh forever. Simply the worst film ever made.

I think this movie is funny and witty but at the same time it's horrible! LOL!
definitely a one time watch.

If you Love stepbrothers, you'll love this. I laughed and laughed some more. Not sure what other reviewers expected, it really is typically funny slapstick and humour. Get on the ride, you won't be disappointed.

This movie is tacky and an insult to Arthur Conan Doyle. Not once did I find something that made me laugh or even smile. People seem to compare it to Step Brothers, a movie I actually really enjoy but I see no comparison except the leading actors. It's just not funny or clever in any way.

reviews.review_title: If I could give it 0 I would
reviews.content:
Shockingly terrible
Turned it off after 25 minutes as didn't want to waste any more of my life on such a pile of rubbish
Would rather watch paint dry whilst sticking needles in my eye
This movie is so damn funny. Okey i watched it stoned. But please Just give it a try.

Came into the theater expecting an abomination of a movie but I came out pleasantly surprised. The chemistry between John Reilly and Will Ferrell is unmatched and this movie had me rolling on the floor laughing while appreciating the historical references.

Probably the worst movie I have watched in a long time. There is nothing good about this apart from Will and John being together again. However this time it didn't work out and it was so boring that I left the showing a good 20 minutes before it finished.

reviews.review_title: The worst from CNN a liberal Innuendos
reviews.content: This show was absolute garbage. When they weren't cracking on about situations facing our current state of America the jokes were horrible. If you want to watch a movie with crappy jokes, and a liberal leaning director. Than this is the one for you. I WANT MY MONEY BACH! Last Will Ferrel movie I'll ever watch.

I took a chance on this "dumb humor" film that I normally wouldn't take, because it's not my thing. Some of the previews made me laugh so I went. Well I left 5-10 mins into the movie and didn't even eat my snacks. I couldn't. There's a scene that involves sexual perversion with a corpse. A corpse people. I don't care what your beliefs are, this is absolutely disturbing and I am disgusted and will never EVER. Be trying annother film like this ever again. Sickening. The only person who would think that's funny is someone on the sexual offender registry or the one who's not on there, YET. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!

I've been a Will Ferrel fan since his early days, and this is just not funny, the chemistry between the characters just isn't there, the plot and environmental gags are just a lame attempt at 3 Stooges humor, but falling very flat. Cheap and stupid humor is great once in awhile, but this film hasn't got any decent, or even low brow humor at all, The Room has more humor in it, and they weren't trying.
I had great hope for this movie because I had enjoyed Stepbrothers. I gave this 2 stars because I giggled a couple of times but other than that this movie is a real stinker.

reviews.review_title: Not even bad, it's much lower than that
reviews.content:
I've seen many bad and stupid movies, but this one is much worst than that. Thank God I watched it in HBO so it's easily switch to other channel and no ticket needed.
I don't know why it still has score, should be lower than 0

It was a free ticket and I'd still like to be compensated for the 20 minutes wasted on this garbage. 10 minutes in I had a panic attack thinking I'd suffered a stroke and just didn't understand what was happening on screen. In what world is this a comedy?

This film is awful...I am currently stuck watching it right now...
Pro: The british supporting cast, set designs and costumes.
Con: Everything else...
I'm losing brain cells as I watch...help..
(if they'd used their supporting british cast, to glean ideas for the script, plot, humor, direction etc...maybe it would've been redeemable)I know this review won't be helpful...but I honestly....oh God...they're singing now...what the hell.

reviews.review_title: Sony should pay me for my time! Worst movie I ever saw!
reviews.content: I am still EMBARRASSED at myself for NOT WALKING OUT OF THIS HORRIBLE EXCUSE FOR A movie.Can't even CAPITALIZE movie. This was so bad my college age kids were begging me to leave half way through.Absolutely DISGUSTING!

I loved the Scary Movoe 1, Idiocracy and this film. This movie is silly slapstick and if you like thet kind of thing - go for it. It never pretended to be something more mature or deep thought provoking. I should note that I have missed the last few movies of the main actors. Maybe, if I had seen them all, I would also be tired by the jokes. So, if you have already seen previous films with Ferell, then probably you will not like it. If, like me, you have not, then you might really enjot this one. It has many references and jokes that I liked. But I am a white male, so just disregard my review and move on :)
We went in expecting a rolling in the isles type of movie, but highly disappointed. Not funny at all, writing was terrible!
I love Will Ferrell but this film is so awful!! There are funny parts/gags but it's like pulling teeth
This movie is not even worth the time. It is by far will Ferrell worst movie. DO NOT see this waste of time
Peurile nonsense. Very, very silly. I usually avoid Will Ferrell. I thought it was stupid and most importantly funny, I laughed, I was entertained, I'd watch it again.

I have never walked out of a cinema during a movie before... Well today was the day! It was honestly painful to watch! I was in disbelief at how bad a movie can actually be... Poor taste, poor jokes and zero humor! 40 minutes that I will never get back(Thank God we didn't stay longer!)

reviews.review_title: I don't understand how people can dislike this movie!
reviews.content: Another classic by this dynamic comedy duo, it's a must see for true Ferrell & Reilly fans. Sure, some moments are over the top, but the laugh out loud moments are steady throughout the film.
This is the best movie ever. Nearly died laughing.

reviews.review_title: Worst movie for both of these actors
reviews.content:
I never saw more people walk out on this movie in my entire life. It was just awful.
This could of been much funnier if the script was better.

Always a fan of every film these two are in + Ferrell's long list of comedies. But this really is not a good film, do not watch - you will be disappointing.Easy going films are good to watch at the cinema and like someone said below sometimes a film is so bad its funny in a good way - not this one.

At the time of this review, it's only getting a 3.8?!?!
Ignore it. This movie rocks.I don't really enjoy comedies. (Slapstick even less.) In fact, comedies are the last choice on my list. I actively avoid them.However! This is one I actually really, really liked.This movie was great. Fun, perfectly slap-stick, exquisitely overacted, and flawless chemistry all in all.

reviews.review_title: I liked it! Made me laugh out loud a bunch of times.
reviews.content:
I don't know what people were expecting. This movie totally makes fun of period pieces and of the whole Sherlock concept. I always thought the Sherlock Holmes character was totally over-the-top unrealistic and dumb, just like all other superhero-type characters. So, I love that this movie makes fun of Sherlock Holmes. People keep mentioning anachronisms, but that's not what most of them really are...the bits that people think are out of the time era are there to mock our modern day practices. I think this movie is simply over everyone's heads. The humor is quick sometimes and you might miss things easily.
It also mocks the whole "sidekick" concept. Why must so many superhero-type characters have a sidekick? It's so unfair to the sidekick. That always bugged me about Sherlock Holmes, too.
I also love how the movie mocks the era...instead of all the glorification that period pieces usually do.
I liked how it also mocks sexism, US-UK relations, British and American stereotypes, and US government/elections.
I enjoyed the acting and the characters and the humor. I can't figure out why so many people hated this movie. Maybe I went into it with such low expectations that I was surprised when I found myself grinning and laughing throughout the movie.

reviews.review_title: I'm having second thoughts about life..
reviews.content: When Will Pharrell started singing I literally got up and left
No need to see. It's getting real old having to babe beat over the head by Hollywood. We get it your not a fan of the average American.

reviews.review_title: Satire Alert...Does anyone even know what that is?
reviews.content: No, I didn't watch this to have a reprise of Step Brothers or Talladaga Nights... As a fan of Homes/Doyle, I laughed non-stop at all the bits and pot-shots the writers took and the anachronisms that were introduced. They even made incessant fun of the very jaded, ignorant audience that could never hope to understand what was happening in this film. This film will separate the sheep from the goats, audience-wise. The Brits and Canucks will roar, the Yanks...."Duh!" And what fun it is!

reviews.review_title: Why do we only want cerebral comedy now???
reviews.content: Stupid, brain left at door, daft humour. You will laugh that's all that matters. That's all the makers of the film want. Stop analysing everything. Just Enjoy.Will Ferrell and John C Reilly are a fantastic double act of puerile comedy.

After the last few Will Ferrel films I wasn't expecting much to begin with but I did go into the cinema expecting to see a bad film and how bad it really was.
The only good I could say was there are a few small laughs throughout the film but that's all you're getting if that. Secondly I enjoyed John C Reiley and probably made the film a little more watchable.
The small story it had seemed to be all over the place with no direction with some thrown in bad jokes about every two minutes and don't forget the pointless romance and love interest for sherlock to add a little spicy unfunniness.
Some good British actors signed up for this film and I hope the making of this film won't keep them up at night.Overall its not the worst film I've seen but its probably down there, if you want to see how bad this film is I'd say go but if you're generally looking for a comedy twist about a famous detective I would stay away.

reviews.review_title: Huge Will F fan. This is unwatchable
reviews.content: This is one of the worst movies I've ever seen. It's hard to take a known and love character like Sherlock and make him funny. That certainly wasn't achieved here. Sherlock is smart one second and an idiot the next. It's not close to funny.

reviews.review_title: Good for a mindless afternoon watch
reviews.content: Dr Grace Hart: "now I get 30 cents for every dollar a man earns."Ahahahahaha... 😂

reviews.review_title: What you see in the trailer it's all what you get!
reviews.content:
I love the actors. They had wonderful movies together and when I saw the trailer I was very excited about the movie. So i grab my friends and I made a reservation to cinema.
The movie it's "Meh". It's a medium movie with a very good trailer. A clickbait I could say. Sad...very sad.

These comments are more fun than the movie!

reviews.review_title: Not worth ruining your view of Will Ferrell Movies
reviews.content: I have honestly enjoyed most WF movies, like Talladega Nights, or Anchorman... Kicking and Screaming is a movie I grew up watching.I saw this with a good friend who hadn't seen any of the aforementioned films, so I was psyching this one up, telling her "this is going to be hilarious."I was super disappointed because this film had so much potential to be funny.I might have apologized on my way out because I really laugh at movies, but most of our laughs here were strained or uncomfortable. Feeble at best.Look, I love movies, but this isn't even worth the $9 ticket.

reviews.review_title: Im not sure why everyone hates this movie
reviews.content: Its not a bad movie and its not hilarious either. It is funny though if you like the humor. Its commentary on modern day. Once you figure that out you can have a nice chuckle over all the jokes. You wont role over laughing, its not that type of humor.

I have seen minimum 300+ films in cinemas...never came out of movie until today. So bad from the very beginning...after 18 mins I left the cinema, I couldn't stand more. All in all DON'T SEE THIS MOVIE, it's so terrible, you will be wasting your time and money!

When I was younger I wouldn't have been too bothered about wasting 86 minutes of my life on a crap movie... that is no longer the case, I feel genuinely robbed of time! I wanted to like it, it's got a great cast but it seems like they all completely lost the plot (if indeed there was a plot to begin with).

Wow I was really expecting something really bad but I kinda felt it was like theater but on the big screen . Brainless fun film just needed a bit more of a dramatic ending. Dont discourage this two working togethers haters! The script was unoriginal and really needed to be a 15 and gone a bit further with some of the punchlines and I think it would have been a classic trying to keep at a 12 is what ruined it! Not desevering of a 3.4 but heroin cocaine ect shouldnt be relevant to young audiences as funny

It's all a bit of fun. Don't take it seriously. It's daft and it has flaws. But I think it's just as good as anything else I've seen JCR and WF Do. I laughed out loud while eating my pizza on a Friday night. I didn't want or expect anything else.

reviews.review_title: Yes, I did watch the whole movie.
reviews.content: I watched the movie and was pretty disappointed within the first 10 minutes. Way to many political innuendos and the movies plot was to childish to even laugh at.

This movie is getting a lot of heat due to it being a very effective parody of the Sherlock Holmes franchise. If it had done a lesser job at mocking the franchise the reviews would've been far more favourable, but alas it was not. The portrayal of Dr. Watson and Sherlock Holmes in this movie is straight up character assasination - which I'd like to remind you is a great compliment for a parody as it is suppossed to 'take the piss' out of what it mimics.I'd compare this movie to 'Life of Brian' which heavily ridiculed the life of Jesus to great effect and at the time recieved a lot of flak for doing so. If you are a devout Christian you are to this day very unlikely to enjoy 'Life of Brian' as it is not kind to the topic it mocks, and the same goes for 'Holmes & Watson'. Many of those who are fans of the new movies made out of Doyle's most famous protagonist will likely be outraged at the sharp - and often both crude and cruel - criticisms of their portrayal of Holmes and Watson. They pull no punches and not only mock the characters but also the time period and the country and traditions of England as well.As someone who does not get offended by anything but poor writing, and who is a big fan of the Holmes character - but can't stand the movie versions of him, particularly the contemporary ones - I enjoyed every bit of this movie. It was made for me, and people like me, who understands and likes the source material but who can't stand how it's been portrayed by Hollywood.I would definitely recommend this movie to other people, even though they most likely won't enjoy it - maybe even because they won't enjoy it. Perhaps then they can share in some the pain I've had to endure as I've watched countless of poorly written movies that other people seem to like.This movie is the opposite of that, it's a well written movie that people hate. And they hate it simply because of what it is trying to do - which it does successfully. All the criticisms of this movie that I've heared - except for one concerning the lips of one of the acresses not matching her words in one scene, which is a valid point - have concerned itself with critiquing the fundamental aim of the parody, to ridicule Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson.It is as if they don't understand that a parody is not suppossed to play nice. This is not an homage, it's a takedown, and I loved every second of it.

There was a group that left halfway through the movie. They made unoriginal barf jokes. The writing was atrocious. Normally, even comedies have serious moments that advance the plot, but this movie lacked that.
I don't know why there's so many hate about this film. I laugh a lot during this film. This is kind of will ferrell movies, more on stupidity. Don't mind the critics just give it a try.

reviews.review_title: What you'd expect from these actors. Good fun slapstick.
reviews.content: Everyone giving 1's are weirdos. It's a comedy.The review is too short. Don't know why thay matters. So this is all just to hit the limit and submit the review the review has to be written now I'm typing jibberish.Why does the review have to be this long I have no Idea. A cat climbed up the tree the other day and found itself stuck on a high branch.I couldn't believe it.

I was in awe, buried deep in many a facepalm during this movie. After being terribly excited to see their newest film, Ferrell and O'Reilly go further than just disappointing me on Xmas day. This movie craps on their legacy of fun, clever comedies. The editing is bad. The ADR was nauseating and distracting and confusing. The plot meanders and often full-stops. The jokes almost never landed well (I think the only thing I liked were the cat lady jokes). Cameos got me excited and again bored me to actual tears of embarrassment. I yelled, "but why!" Many many people left the theater but I made my friends stay because I had hope that I was being pranked by this movie. I kept asking myself, "there's no WAY it is this bad, right?" Alas, my poor Watson, it's unenjoyable stuff and nonsense. Avoid. You'll gain nothing but sadness and existential dread. 💔

reviews.review_title: Wanted to give a zero out of ten.
reviews.content:
Not even worth watching. I am a Sherlock Holmes fan, grew up on the original source material.
This movie is just a huge disrespect to that material while Will Farrel and John C. Reilly act like idiots. I couldn't even finish watching this movie it's so bad.
Would be better to watch the Robert Downey Jr./Jude Law movies instead if you want an actual Sherlock Holmes movie. The Ferrel/Reilly version is like the idiot Holmes brother that the family doesn't speak about in comparison.

I'm sure you can see from these other reviews, just how horrific this movie is. This movie is filled with historical inaccuracies, some that obviously are on purpose, such as the selfie, television etc... which are done for humorous intentions. However, what really bugged me about this movie was seeing Queen Victoria and The Titanic in the same screen...

reviews.review_title: This is an insult to Arthur Conan Doyle and not worthy of a Coen movie
reviews.content: I attempted to watch this drivel with my teenage daughter, and I was embarrassed by the low brow humour and stupidity. I switched it off rather than suffer any further. My advice to you is skip on to something else, time is valuable, to me at least - clearly not to the people who produced this garbage.
I am so surprised people hate this movie so much. It was a good laugh, exactly what i was looking for and expecting from these two actors. Does not deserve the absolute disdain its getting.
If you think this gets better after the first 10 mins, it does not.Watch anything else

It doesn't happen often but I cried a lot during this film. It's incredibly silly and clever and funny. I don't understand why so many people don't like it. It's one of the better comedy's to come out this decade.so many great references. I'll be rewatching this.

reviews.review_title: Not on par but ok nonetheless
reviews.content: On the unconscious level my brain informed me that this was not making me pee my pants every minute like Step Brothers but at the same time perhaps I was concentrating too much on their English accent haha. It was however funny on a level and I can't say I wished for the movie to end. I do like this duo... they are my favourite and this was something a bit different from the rest.

reviews.review_title: Great story overshadowed by dry humour
reviews.content: I'd go so far to say that this is one of the most accurate representations of Sherlock and Watson, geniuses with a dash of wit and cunning. And the story is original and genuinely caught me off guard a few times by the subtitle twists.But what puts my score down ian that this great story is overshadowed by dry humour forced in, where they could have had a great mystery it turns into a farse comedy with lots of missed potential. I enjoyed the casting and would like to see a sequel with less forced humour.8/10 great representation from the source material with dry humour forced in.

I'm so very disappointed. "Step Brothers" and "Talladega Nights" were comedy gems to me in so many ways. I really thought there could be no way these two guys could make a movie this bad. The screenplay is wretched. I hate to think Will and John went for a money grab, alas I can make no other sense. This one makes "Anchorman 2" seem like one of the best movies ever. Do not ever watch this movie. It's straight garbage.

reviews.review_title: I enjoyed it, try it for yourself if you like comedies
reviews.content: I'll preface this by saying I've probably seen upwards of 95% of comedies from the past 40-50 years, from old stuff like Caveman, the Kentucky Fried Movie, Under the Rainbow, and all the Police Academies, through more popular recent films like 22 Jump Street and Central Intelligence, all of which I liked. I'm not a film critic, I'm just a big fan of comedy.I waited a long time to watch Holmes and Watson because of how absolutely terrible the reviews here made it out to be, but I ended up enjoying it now that I've seen it. I won't say "it's not as bad as people make it out to be", because quite frankly I don't think it's bad at all. This is a decent comedy. The plot isn't Shutter Island but it kept me engrossed. It's more along the line of most Sandler films, the story is just a vehicle for the gags.A lot of the humor is subtle, in some cases referencing old stuff that a lot of young viewers just won't get. Have you seen Ghost, and do you know the song that plays during the clay molding scene? Well if not, an entire bit is going over your head. But if you do catch it you'll get a chuckle without any dialogue or physicality to provoke it. Likewise, some jokes require the viewer to pick up on facial or body reactions, sound, or even background material.There's a fair amount of politically incorrect and low brow humor which could put some people off. There are also a couple one liner modern day political digs that feel out of place and fall flat. Whoever made this film did not hire a what's cool in hollywood or at the BBC consultant. It's not a film for film critics either, that's for sure. It's also not as good as Step Brothers, which was a tough act to follow. I think these may be some reasons why it garnered so many one star reviews.I took the time to write this up so others who share my tastes might give this film a try for themselves rather than being put off by the scathing reviews. I gave it an 8. Not one of my all time favorites, but I'm glad I watched it. I'd say based on all the comedies I've seen, this would normally be sitting at a 5.5-5.9 rating  probably in the Joe Dirt sort of range, not the 3.8 it's got at the time I'm reviewing it.

I had a lot of fun watching this movie. I was surprised to see so many negative reviews, hence I am writing this. I had a good laugh, of course you need to enjoy this kind of humor. Maybe you need to be a bit childish, which I am.Definitely recommended! Have a beer and relax.

I love the movie
No matter how much hateful I enjoyed pretty much
Actors have really done well
The movie doesn't lack it's pace Beginning to end it was so fun

I don't see this as a spoof, the only resemblance to Guy Ritchie is the Holmes-o-vision, which is done hilariously. The rest of the movie is pure Ferrell/Reilly gold. My father wasn't a Will Farrell fan, so I guess if it just not your style of comedy why even bother, especially don't right a bad review of someones art. That's like saying a restaurant sucks because you hated the oysters, but what everyone reading your review doesn't know, is that you never liked oysters. That or you just don't have a sense of humor, which in that case, shove off

reviews.review_title: I really don't understand the poor reviews!
reviews.content:
This is meant to be farce, people! Why else have 2 Americans playing lead British roles. Their accents alone are worth the entrance fee. I've seen these guys in their other pairings but it this one keeps me laughing the most.It's a comedy. Don't take it too seriously. Very easy watching and full of moments you may miss first time round so go back and watch them again."You don't need to ask me twice to do do a Dutch jig!"
"Hudson! Watson's shoved a carrot up my bum!"

reviews.review_title: Give me the last 2 hours of my life back
reviews.content: Think my title says it all...love these guys, loved Stepbrothers...this was garbage. My review only contain spoilers if the spoiler is that it sucked.

reviews.review_title: Harshly Reviewed, A Fine Comedy Effort.
reviews.content: I can only assume the poor reviews this film has received is from people who didn't understand that the hammy overacting in the film was part of the point. Playing pompous, OTT characters in a parody of a Victorian character and the humour style of Ferrell and Reilly, it's completely to be expected. Aside from it, it stands well as a good comedy film.

reviews.review_title: If you didn't like this then you just don't get it.
reviews.content: I have watched this movie over and over again, because I cant stop laughing out loud to it. This movie has gotten so many bad reviews that aren't warranted. Maybe some people don't understand Sherlock Holmes enough to get the jokes, since many of the jokes poke fun at the old stories.

This movie was literally the stupidest movie i ever watched. I personally have watched hundreds of movies. The movie cover is funnier then this entire movie combined. I couldnt even make it half way. NOTHING IS FUNNY. There is at no point any sense of humor.

reviews.review_title: I did laugh out loud many times
reviews.content: This is not a master piece, but if you have a sense of humor and appreciate the silliness and how everything can be so politically incorrect, you should watch it.

reviews.review_title: Entertaining despite not being their best film.
reviews.content: Up front, if you go into this expecting it to be another Step Brothers or Talladega Nights you're going to be disappointed. I am a big Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly fan so despite the poor trailers I still needed to see it. If you are shying away from it because of the trailer I understand, but I truly think they put the worst jokes in the movie in the trailer.That said, the movie is not nearly as bad as everyone keeps saying. There are a few jokes that really hit home if you pay attention and a few that fall flat.Overall I think the entire cast does a good job with their roles and even though this isn't a traditional kind of Sherlock Holmes movie I enjoyed it. I would even watch a sequel if they made one.Despite my favorable review I do think overall it's a middle of the road kind of movie that is an entertaining watch the first time through...however, I don't see a reason to revisited it like I do their other movies.
Turned it off after 20min in. Not funny at all don't waste your time watching this it's that bad.
